评论详情: Truth be told, white tops are see through most of the time. And with white racerback tank tops with a great silhouette, one needs a beige raceback sports bra. It’s almost imporssible to find. I am so glad I found this one. I ordered a medium and it’s nice and snug but not tight. The padding is also nice and not some strange shape or thickness. If you want to wear a white racerback, this is absolutely perfect!
The material is very soft very nice not see through just like picture.
Ordered a Large based on size chart measurements, it’s way too big. Minimal to no support and major side boob.

评论概述: Less supportive but not a dealbreaker
评论详情: Like other reviews have said, this is a bit less supportive than other tops/bras like it. But the print is cute and I’m small enough (34B) that I don’t need a ton of support to begin with, so I decided to keep it. Was definitely supportive enough for pickleball, but I wouldn’t take it running. It does run a little big (I normally wear a medium in items like it, but I got a small).

I love this crop top! It is so cute and fits perfectly. The material is so soft. RBX is a great active wear brand and this is yet another fabulous product. I would recommend ordering whatever size you normally wear. This top is so comfortable and I plan to wear it all the time.
I have three of these and love them.  Great fit.

评论概述: Does not run true to size!
评论详情: Nice product but this should easily have fit at Medium and did not.  And this seller does not allow Amazon returns.  You have to take it to the USPO AND pay for return shipping.  Not fair considering their size chart is wrong!

评论概述: The color is exactly as it is in the photo.
评论详情: I’m very happy with this item.

Great fabric, but it definitely designed for someone with a smaller frame and a bigger chest because there doesn't seem to be a lot of support. It's not intended for high impact or event medium or low impact workouts that might require you to bend over at all. Almost more so an athleisure top with a built in "bra" for just hanging about. So, it's cute but I wouldn't order again.
Love the soft feeling, colors and fit… too bad they’re not selling this anymore

I love the color in this top. For me personally I wish it was a little bit longer because it sits above my waist line and I find myself tugging on it two make it feel more comfortable. I mostly wear it with a pair of overalls that I am. It makes for a cute combination with overalls

The quality and color are what I expected. However, I ordered the light purple workout top. The image clearly shows a scoop neck and back. But I received a high neck and back. Will be returning, just not what I was looking for. Although, if it was it’s great
Very thin and transparent material
This a very comfortable and cute top.  The manufacturer may need to consider adding removable pads for coverage.
I ordered a medium and am a 34B and 140 lbs and too was not supportive at all. If you want a true sports bra fit size down.
Love the design and comfort of this sports bra. Has good support. The color is so flattering for summer with a good tan. Wearing this throughout my pregnancy! Absolutely recommend. @ivanov.farm.house
I ordered a medium and it was very small.  The material is high quality - but did not like the fit.
Very pretty material but I had to return as it runs very large
Fits great for workouts —stays in place.
The product was cute, but the xs was too big for me.
I like the style and the pattern was cute but it was too small.  Unflattering on me because it does not provide enough support.
I love it
